mapper.select: SELECT * FROM c_order_express WHERE order_id = #{id} AND ship_name IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM c_order o, c_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND o.is_cancel = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM c_order_express WHERE oe.order_id = o.id) > 1 AND (oe.order_number IS NULL OR oe.order_number = '')

SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM c_order o, c_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND (1 = (SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM c_order_express WHERE order_id = o.id)) AND o.is_cancel = 0 AND ( (oe.route_state = 'WAIT_FILL' OR oe.route_state = 'ALREADY_FILL') OR (oe.pay_state = 'WAIT_PAY' AND (oe.order_number IS NULL OR oe.order_number = '')) )

SELECT * FROM c_order o WHERE id IN ( SELECT t.order_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM c_order_express oe WHERE (oe.sender_user_uuid = #{userUuid} OR oe.ship_user_uuid = #{userUuid}) ) AS t ) AND order_type = 'ORDER_MYSTERY' ORDER BY o.create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}

select c_order_express.id, c_order_express.order_number, c_order.pay_time, c_order.pay_method, c_order.distribution_method, c_order.sender_name, c_order.sender_mobile, c_order.sender_province, c_order.sender_city, c_order.sender_area, c_order.sender_addr, c_order.word_message, c_order.image, c_order.voice, c_order.longitude, c_order.latitude, c_order.sender_user_uuid, c_order.gift_card_id, c_order_express.ship_name, c_order_express.ship_mobile, c_order_express.ship_province, c_order_express.ship_city, c_order_express.ship_area, c_order_express.ship_addr, c_order_express.weight, c_order_express.package_type, c_order_express.object_type, c_order_express.route_state, c_order_express.is_use, c_order_express.sender_user_uuid, c_order_express.order_id, c_order_express.ship_user_uuid from c_order, c_order_express where (c_order_express.sender_user_uuid=#{sender_user_uuid} or c_order_express.ship_user_uuid=#{ship_user_uuid})
and c_order_express.route_state=#{state}
SELECT * FROM c_order o, c_order_express oe WHERE oe.uuid = #{uuid} AND o.id = oe.order_id
